# wqbc

Water Quality Thresholds and Index Calculations for British Columbia

The wqbc R package calculates water quality thresholds and water quality indices
and plots water quality indices spatially and temporally for
British Columbia.

## Install

To install the latest version of jaggernaut:

```
# install.packages("devtools")
library(devtools)
install_github("poissonconsulting/wqbc")
library(wqbc)
```
